page.title: 05ETTRICK 18th CENTURY,BOSTON.
page.content: Our local hall is called "The Boston Memorial Hall" named after Thomas Boston.Born at Duns in 1676,he was a minister in the Scottish Church in Ettrick on the site where the new church is today.He came to Ettrick in 1704 and was ordained on Mayday 1707, the same day on which was effected the Union between Scotland and England.He lived in a Manse near to where the new Manse has been built.He died in May 1732 leaving his wife and four children.He was famous for writing books about religion which are still read today.
